title: Section 2 -Monkeypox Clinical Sample Results
body:
For each genetic element, the following information is provided:

• Source of the reference sequence tiled on the chip, • Call rate • Alignment of measured sequence from PathogenID and the reference sequence with differences marked with a yellow highlight.

Orthopoxvirus, Variola major virus, RNA polymerase large subunit Reference: GenBank S55844 (Start=7414, End=7689) Call rate = 99.28% Matching score = 97.83% Pairwise-BLAST score = 504.01 (The blue highlights mark polymorphisms that uniquely indicate that the polymerase belongs to Monkeypox rather than Variola.)
